EmailTemplate.description: Information for customer prior DL950 upgrade
EmailTemplate.name: BRH DL950 Upgrade Information Request
EmailTemplate.subject: DL 950 Upgrade Information{!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for contacting Honeywell. We have attached an informational letter for your review regarding DL 950 Upgrade. If you have any additional technical questions, please contact our Technical Operations Center (number provided below).
For assistance prior placing an order, please contact your Honeywell Area Sales Manager. Contact information can be found in the Service Bulletin attached.
Once you have received the upgrade please contact us in order to switch the load format for your NAVDB subscription. Please note there is no extra cost on your NavDB subscription for HD and USB format.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Account Management Representative(AMR) Honeywell | Aerospaceï€ Email: dsa@honeywell.com Phone: 602-436-6739 Fax: 602-822-7333 For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States, Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
